description: Indicates the model supports deployment through HuggingFace's managed inference API service for production environments.
Models that can be fine-tuned using HuggingFace's AutoTrain service without requiring manual code.
Optimized backend for deploying and serving Large Language Models (LLMs) with high performance.
Models with published evaluation metrics, benchmarks, or test results available for review.
Indicates a HuggingFace Space demo exists for this model allowing interactive testing without setup.
Models quantized to 4-bit precision, reducing memory footprint while maintaining reasonable performance.
Models with custom implementation code beyond standard library functionality.
Models created by merging multiple other models, often to combine their strengths or capabilities.
Models with documented carbon footprint information related to their training process.
Models quantized to 8-bit precision, balancing performance and memory efficiency.
Architecture where multiple specialized sub-models (experts) are conditionally activated based on input.
